summary: This test package validates the core symplectic operator classes in Qiskit’s quantum information module, including Clifford objects, Pauli and PauliList representations, Pauli basis utilities, and the SparsePauliOp structure. The tests cover decomposition, algebraic properties, circuit integration, serialization, visualization, matrix conversion, iteration, parameter handling, and edge‑case error checking.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of quantum‑information operator implementations used in quantum computing applications, enabling reliable algorithm development and maintenance of the Qiskit software stack.
